com.mapquest.android.maps
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  com.mapquest.android.maps.Configuration

public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to configure and exercise some of the lesser used options available in the SDK, if you would like to change or use things in this class use the MapView.getConfiguration method in order to get reference to it.

Method Summary
 boolean isSatellite()
          Retrieve the set value of satellite mode
 boolean isSatelliteLabeled()
          When satellite tiles are used and isLabelSatellite mode=true, the tiles will have label with street names etc, other wise no labels will be drawn, defaults to true

Method Detail

isSatelliteLabeled

public boolean isSatelliteLabeled()
When satellite tiles are used and isLabelSatellite mode=true, the tiles will have label with street names etc, other wise no labels will be drawn, defaults to true

Returns:
true if satellite lables are on
